Build-Depends: debhelper-compat (= 13), dh-sequence-python3, mpi-default-dev, mpi-default-bin, openssh-client, cython3, python3-all-dev, python3-numpy, python3-sphinx, python3-setuptools
Build-Depends-Indep: texinfo, texlive, latexmk, tex-gyre, texlive-latex-extra, python3-doc, python-numpy-doc
Package-List: python-mpi4py-doc deb doc optional arch=all python3-mpi4py deb python optional arch=any
Testsuite-Triggers: libpmix-dev, libucx-dev, mpi-default-dev, python3-all, python3-cffi, python3-dill, python3-numpy, python3-setuptools, python3-simplejson, python3-yaml
